name: Zi Liang

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
text: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
text: Zi Liang is a devout worshiper of Chauntea, the Earth Mother. She has considerably less faith in Goldenfields' defenders, so she patrols the temple-farm during her off-duty hours.
Ideal: "If we faithfully tend to our gardens and our fields, Chauntea will smile upon us."
Bond: "Goldenfields is the breadbasket of the North. People depend on its safety and prosperity, and I'll do what must be done to protect it."
Flaw: "I don't trust authority. I do what my heart says is right."

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Sling
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. Zi carries twenty sling stones.
